name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior React Native Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, I specialize in developing cross-platform mobile applications utilizing **React Native** alongside **JavaScript** and **TypeScript**. My hands-on expertise in creating seamless user experiences is bolstered by a strong understanding of **UI/UX best practices**, where I prioritize user engagement and functionality.
I possess extensive experience in building **RESTful APIs** and integrating with **Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE)** for hardware-connected applications, enhancing the functionality of smart home and energy systems. My background in software development includes proficiency with **CI/CD processes**, ensuring efficient and reliable code deployment.
Additionally, I am skilled in using tools like **Git** for version control and have a collaborative mindset that fosters strong communication across teams. My ability to work with **native modules** and **BLE libraries** further supports the development of innovative IoT solutions, including **EV charging tech**. I am committed to delivering high-performance solutions in dynamic environments, ensuring that projects are completed on time and meet top-quality standards.
